name: Star
tldr: Represents excellence, favorites, or something special. Also ratings and achievements.

contextMeanings.meaning: Referring to stars or the night sky.
Recognizing great performance or marking priorities.

platformNotes.note: Often used to mark important messages or give kudos.
Common in posts about achievements or favorites.
Used to highlight special content or achievements.

generationalNotes.note: Used for highlighting favorites and special things.
Used straightforwardly for stars or excellence.

seoTitle: ⭐ Star Emoji Meaning - What Does ⭐ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the star emoji ⭐ really means in texting. Represents excellence, favorites, or something special. Complete context guide.
